name: Asta Kask
description:
'''Asta Kask''' is a Swedish punk band from [[TÃ¶reboda]], [[Sweden]], founded in 1978. Asta Kask plays melodic punk music with Swedish lyrics; they are a foundational band for the musical subgenre known as [[trallpunk]].

The band have gained international reputation and their songs have been [[Cover version|covered]] by acts from three continents. German punk rock band [[Rasta Knast]] started as a tribute band to Asta Kask.
